credit_line: Gift of the Museum of Modern Art
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 428 x 115 cm (14 ft. 1/2 in. x 45 1/4 in.)
title: Harmony
medium:
Medium: polyester
Technique: heat-transfer printed with intentional wrinkles
description: A plain woven, white polyester fabric is deliberately wrinkled, then printed with heat-transfer sheets in a soft blue-gray. Heat and pressure permanently set both the ink and the wrinkles. When the fabric is expanded, the white, undyed areas inside the creases are revealed.
name: Textile
